sentences.en: Now. He began to pull the gun out of its holster.
sentences.cn: 看准时机他开始把枪从枪套拿出。

sentences.en: Joe's hand felt for his gun, freeing it from its holster.
sentences.cn: 乔的手摸索他的枪，释放从它的皮套它。

sentences.en: A woman renting out the costumes handed Mr. Ma a leather holster.
sentences.cn: 出租服装的女人递给马先生一只皮带。
